sense.def:
Izraz
they
uporabljamo za osebe ali stvari, ki smo jih pred kratkim omenili ali katerih identiteta je znana.

seg.quote: All universities have chancellors. They are always rather senior people.

sense.def:
Izraz
they
se nanaša tudi na ljudi na splošno ali na skupino ljudi, katerih identiteta ni pojasnjena v besedilu.

seg.quote: Isn't that what they call love.

sense.def:
Izraz
they
lahko uporabimo namesto
he
ali
she
za osebo, katere spol ni znan ali naveden. Nekateri tej rabi nasprotujejo, češ da ni pravilna.

seg.quote: Nearly everybody thinks they're middle class.
I was going to stay with a friend, but they were ill.
